segments.text: I'm calling today about a bill that I never received .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me which credit card it was for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was for my Master Card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should've gotten that bill two weeks ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't got it in the mail yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The computer is showing that all bills have been mailed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I supposed to do about my bill then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you should call your post office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if it's their mistake , can I get an extension on my bill payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but you will need to send us proof of their mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , thank you very much for your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem . Enjoy the rest of your day .
segments.speaker: S2
